Orca Tutorials

(Not yet converted to Orca2)

Note that only the first 2 tutorials work with CRUD transport

  • System composition.
    • Tutorial 0. Quick Start Guide with two example components.
    • Tutorial 1. Two components with Stage simulator. Easy transition to real hardware.
    • Tutorial 2. Three components with Stage simulator. Display data from a robot and control its motion from a GUI. Easy transition to real hardware.
    • Tutorial 3. Two components with a SICK laser hardware on multiple hosts.
    • Tutorial 4. System composition with Gorca utility.
    • Tutorial 5. System deployment with orcad daemon.
  • Writing Components.
    • The Example Components are an easy way to see how components are written.
